title: Give us a go
creator_credit: Materials Production, Education Dept for Equal Opportunity Board and Diane Charleson
brief_description: An explanation of the functions of the Equal Opportunity Board as it relates to the disabled. Various examples of discrimination are shown together with re-enactments showing conciliation and Board hearings.
